name: Modal Dialog
styles: flex-col w-auto max-w-[480] bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl

children.name: Modal Header
children.styles: flex-row justify-between items-center w-full p-[16] border-b border-[#E5E7EB]

children.name: Close Button
children.styles: flex-row justify-center items-center w-[32] h-[32] rounded-full hover:bg-[#F3F4F6]

children.name: Content Text
children.text: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

children.name: Modal Footer
children.styles: flex-row justify-end w-full gap-[12] p-[16] bg-[#F9FAFB] border-t border-[#E5E7EB]

children.name: Cancel Button
children.styles: w-auto px-[16] py-[8] bg-white border border-[#D1D5DB] hover:bg-[#F3F4F6] rounded-md

children.name: Delete Button
children.styles: w-auto px-[16] py-[8] bg-[#EF4444] hover:bg-[#DC2626] rounded-md
